LanguageData.KTWildDryadArtistic.title: творческая
LanguageData.KTWildDryadArtistic.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is seemingly less hostile than other dryads. But is it simply [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't care?
LanguageData.KTWildDryadCurious.title: любопытная
LanguageData.KTWildDryadCurious.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a curious one. Often stalking and observing intruders and when in contact, [PAWN_pronoun] likes to prod em to see what makes them tick.
LanguageData.KTWildDryadHarsh.title: резкая
LanguageData.KTWildDryadHarsh.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is harsh and viscious. [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't pull [PAWN_possessive] punches and will gladly poke others were it stings the most.
LanguageData.KTWildDryadHostile.title: враждебная
LanguageData.KTWildDryadHostile.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has that extra spite, keen to lash out and wants nothing more than to dance on [PAWN_possessive] enemies corpses.
LanguageData.KTWildDryadMagic.title: невообразимая
LanguageData.KTWildDryadMagic.baseDesc: What [PAWN_nameDef] is or was is not clear.
LanguageData.KTWildDryadSprouted.title: проросшая
LanguageData.KTWildDryadSprouted.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] sprouted from the remains of unwilling or maybe even willing offering. It's clearly not the first time [PAWN_pronoun] has walked the land.
